detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
The document serves as a formal notification to the Nigerian Exchange Limited regarding changes to the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc. It outlines the appointment of a new Non-Executive Director following recent retirements and resignations within the Board.

#### Key Dates
- **Date of Disclosure:** 21 June 2024
- **Board Meeting Date:** 19 June 2024

#### Board Composition Changes
- **New Appointment:** 
  - **Name:** Mr. Kofo Majekodunmi
  - **Position:** Non-Executive Director
  - **Reason for Appointment:** To fill a casual vacancy created by the recent retirements and resignations of other Directors.

#### Profile of Mr. Kofo Majekodunmi
- **Professional Background:** 
  - Legal practitioner with over 30 years of experience in Corporate & Commercial law, particularly in the Banking sector.
- **Current Positions:**
  - Board Chairman of FBN Holdings Plc Ghana
  - Director at MBC Capital Limited
  - Director at Custodian Life Assurance Limited
  - Director at Custodian Insurance Limited
- **Educational Qualifications:**
  - Bachelor of Laws (LLB) from the London School of Economics and Political Science
  - Bachelor of Law (BL) from the Nigerian Law School
  - Master of Business Administration (MBA) from Lagos Business School

#### Signatory
- **Name:** Chuka Mordi
- **Position:** Not specified in the document, but he is a Director of Ellah Lakes Plc.

#### Company Information
- **Company Name:** Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address:** No. 10 Muritala Mohammed Way, Benin City, Edo State
- **Website:** www.ellahlakes.com

This summary encapsulates all significant details from the corporate disclosure document regarding the changes in the Board of Directors at Ellah Lakes Plc.
